# Predict which wine features are the best quality wine indicators

:::{.callout-tip}
## Exercise:

The Wine Quality dataset contains information about various chemical properties of different wines, including their acidity, residual sugar, and alcohol content. This dataset can be used to build a model to predict which features are the best quality red wine indicators.
What kind of model will you build?
:::

Load the libraries:

```{r}
library(readr)
```

Load the data:


```{r}
library(readr)
wine_data <- read_delim("../datasets/winequality-red.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```
